Constructor Detail

EntityControllerFullTextSearch

public EntityControllerFullTextSearch(java.lang.String configurationFile)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
The compass engine is initialized by the configuration file in this constructor. The configuration should involve the information of compass name which will be used to read the compass configuration from database and the information of the COREDB setting. However, if the configuration file does not provide the compass name parameter or it provides but the compass configuration in database for this compass name does not exist, users need to set their own compass configuration.

Parameters:
configurationFile - the file name
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

EntityControllerFullTextSearch

public EntityControllerFullTextSearch(java.lang.String dbURL,
                                      java.lang.String databaseType,
                                      java.lang.String databaseDriver,
                                      java.lang.String databaseName,
                                      java.lang.String user,
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String compassName)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
The compass engine is initialized by parameters which are the COREDB setting and the compass name. However, if the configuration file does not provide the compass name parameter or it provides but the compass configuration in database for this compass name does not exist, users need to set their own compass configuration.

Parameters:
dbURL - the database connection URL utilized by COREDB.
databaseType - the type of database
databaseDriver - the JDBC driver name
databaseName - the name of database
user - database user name
password - database password
compassName - the name of compass instance which configuration is saved in database.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
Method Detail

setCompassConfiguration

public boolean setCompassConfiguration(java.lang.String compassName)
Set compass configuration using existing compass. EntityControllerFullTextSearch engine will be rebuilt based on the new compass configuration.

Specified by:
setCompassConfiguration in interface IEntityControllerFullTextSearch
Parameters:
compassName - the name of compass that will replace current compassConfiguration.
Returns:
true if the rebuild is successful; otherwise, return false;

saveCurrentIndexDataToOtherIndexStorage

public boolean saveCurrentIndexDataToOtherIndexStorage(org.compass.core.config.CompassConfiguration configuration,
                                                       boolean isCleanOld,
                                                       boolean isRebuild)
This function save current createIndex data to another createIndex storage (eg: from JDBC to File)

Specified by:
saveCurrentIndexDataToOtherIndexStorage in interface IEntityControllerFullTextSearch
Parameters:
configuration - the compass configuration of the destination createIndex storage
isCleanOld - indicates whether clean all createIndex data store in current createIndex storage
isRebuild - indicates whether rebuild compass using the new storage
Returns:
returns true if action is successful, otherwise returns false
